title: Fire Danger - Total Fire Ban
summary: Extreme fire danger conditions. All campfires and BBQs are prohibited. Exercise extreme caution.

title: Track Closure - Great Ocean Walk
summary: Section 3 of the Great Ocean Walk is temporarily closed due to maintenance. Alternative routes available.

title: Wildlife Activity Notice
summary: Increased koala activity in the Green Mountains area. Please drive carefully and keep a safe distance.

title: Weather Warning - Extreme Heat
summary: Temperatures expected to reach 45Â°C. Ensure adequate water supplies and avoid strenuous activities during peak heat.

title: Seasonal Wildflower Display
summary: Peak wildflower season is now underway. Best viewing areas are marked with interpretive signs.
source: Department of Biodiversity Conservation and Attractions

title: Avalanche Risk - Overland Track
summary: High avalanche risk on the Overland Track. Only experienced hikers with appropriate equipment should proceed.

title: Wet Season Access Restrictions
summary: Some roads and tracks may be impassable due to wet season conditions. Check conditions before travel.

title: Maintenance Work - Namadgi Visitor Centre
summary: Visitor centre will be closed for maintenance on weekends during January. Information available at ranger station.

title: Rockfall Risk - Three Sisters Area
summary: Increased rockfall risk in the Three Sisters area. Stay on designated paths and avoid cliff edges.
source: NSW National Parks and Wildlife Service

title: Cultural Site Access
summary: Some Aboriginal cultural sites are temporarily closed for cultural ceremonies. Respect all signage and restrictions.
